answers.answer: Are you on a high protein diet or taking protein supplements?Are you doing any foot pump and making circles with your ankles every hour?Are you elevating your leg to reduce swelling or wearing compression stockings?  Do you have circulatory problems?Do you have any other medical problems that would impede healing, like diabetes or take medications that would slow healing like steroids?Do you smoke?Have you talked to your doctor about any of this?  If not, I would.

question: What helped speed up healing process? Specific exercises and times are needed, thanks
title: Calcaneus fracture ,help me walk
